item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 7, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Evaluating the world model implicit in a generative model (27 points | discuss)
2. Passport Photos (758 points | 102 comments)
3. Jeopardy game using LLM and Python (12 points | 3 comments)
4. A rudimentary quantum network link between Dutch cities (37 points | 6 comments)

7. 131M American Buildings (145 points | 27 comments)
8. Show HN: Hacker News frontpage as a print newspaper that you can personalize (329 points | 87 comments)

10. Nvidia Rides AI Wave to Pass Apple as Largest Company (64 points | 44 comments)

12. Launch HN: Midship (YC S24) – Turn PDFs, docs, and images into usable data (75 points | 42 comments)
13. One year, 41M digits: How Luke Durant found the largest known prime number (46 points | 23 comments)
14. Show HN: TutoriaLLM – AI Integrated programming tutorials (12 points | 3 comments)
15. Physicists spot quantum tornadoes twirling in a 'supersolid' (76 points | 2 comments)

23. Forget CDK and AWS's insane costs. Pulumi and DigitalOcean to the rescue (122 points | 80 comments)
24. Trudeau government bans TikTok from operating in Canada (570 points | 328 comments)
25. Australia proposes ban on social media for those under 16 (165 points | 125 comments)
26. Hacking cars in JavaScript (Replay attacks in the browser with the HackRF) (67 points | 1 comment)

28. Kernel optimization with BOLT (binary optimization and layout tool) (162 points | 20 comments)
29. Bringing Faster Exceptions to Rust (8 points | discuss)
